definitions: The act of hitting or trying to hit something with a sharp blow.
The act of hitting an insect, especially a fly, with a swat or other object.
The act of making a prank call to emergency services in order to dispatch a large number of armed police officers to a particular address.
examples: The cat was swatting at the dangling toy.
He was swatting flies all afternoon.
The gamer was a victim of swatting.
